PolyPharma.neo4j_Importers.GO_UNIPROT_Inserter.link_annotation(CH_PROT_ID, p_type, p_load)[source]¶

Links a uniprote node to an annotation node

Parameters:
  • CH_PROT_ID – swissprot ID
  • p_type – type of the annotation
  • p_load – content of the annotation
PolyPharma.neo4j_Importers.GO_UNIPROT_Inserter.manage_acnums(acnum, Acnum2RProts)[source]¶

implements an accelerated dict-assisted buffering on retrieval of relations between accession numbers and uniprot IDs

Parameters:
  • acnum – accession number
  • Acnum2RProts – Buffering dictionary mapping accession numbers to protein IDs
Returns:

protein list if acession number has been buffered, nothing otherwise
